Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

totally out of the blue (like 1 week ago it still worked) I am getting an error message "CKAN.ModuleNotFoundKraken" when trying to start Ckan.

I have version 1.24.0.

I tried to google for a problem but did not find a solution.

Any help to fix this?
Are there newer versions of this program?

Regards,

Chris

Hi Bogey71,

I encountered this problem too today, and I found out the way to solve it.

Execute ckan.exe from command window, with option "update" (like this: ckan.exe update).

You will get a message that says some modules are updated, and then you can use ckan normally (from GUI too, of course).

See this issue: https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/issues/1982

Best wishes,

N. Kaitoh

I have the same issue and tried the things mentioned but it still doesnt work.

The difference is it said it updated on 0 modules...

Does anyone know an answer to my problem?
